hanzi-su-wiki:
娘

Значения

Девушка, дочь

Мнемоника

  • Хороший 良 ребёнок женского пола 女 — дочь.

  • "Моя дочь — хорошая 良 девушка 女."

Варианты

孃, 嬢
purpleculture_pinyin:
niáng
mother; young lady; (coll.) effeminate
мать; молодая леди; (колл.) женоподобный
rtega_mnemonic:
娘娘RSmother, young girl, woman, wife
  • good virtuous 良 woman 女
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 良 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
大娘 [ dà niáng ]: (coll.) father's older brother's wife; aunt (polite address)
新娘 [ xīn niáng ]: bride
娘家 [ niáng jia ]: married woman's parents' home
红娘 [ hóng niáng ]: matchmaker
娘子 [ niáng zǐ ]: (dialect) form of address for one's wife; polite form of address for a woman
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 女 [ nǚ ] woman, girl; female
    • 良 [ liáng ] good, virtuous, respectable
heisig_chinese_memo: Your mom is a high-quality woman.  She's a good mom to the kids and works too :-).
koohiiStory1: Your daughter is a good girl......well, let´s hope so... :-).
koohiiStory2: Be careful not to think woman + angel here, which has already been seen for attractive (#430). Suggest using woman with a halo, as in an innocent girl, something that everyone sees their daughters as being.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A woman who is good is my daughter. My daughter is a good woman, I guarantee it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at how good this woman is! She’s my daughter! She’s good! You wish your daughter was as good a woman as mine is!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your daughter, on the other hand, is not a good woman. Your daughter looks like a moose who may (むすめ) not be able to find its way out of a wet paper bag. Your daughter looks like a moose who may lose its way without a map. Your daughter looks like a moose who may do lots of stupid things.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Think about how your daughter is basically a moose who may do dumb things. How ashamed you feel. How very, very ashamed. Unlike how I feel about my wonderful, perfect, not a moose-like daughter.
Ru_trainchinese: niáng: (сущ) мать; тетя (обращение к пожилой замужней женщине); девочка, девушка
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the good (良) woman (女) is your daughter
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Your mom is a high-quality woman.  She's a good mom to the kids and works too :-).
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The oracle bone inscriptions start with the sound of " female " and " good ", the original meaning is girl, and later borrow the meaning of " niang " to mean mother, see " niang " "Tang Yun": "Mother, Tongmian, the name of a young girl." Duan Yucai's note of " Mother " says: "According to the "Guang Yun" mother, the female is good, and the mother is called. The mother is also the good cut, the name of the girl The two characters in the Tang dynasty are divided into pictures. Therefore, there is no such thing as a mother in the word Yeniang, which is rarely known today." Before the Tang Dynasty, the two characters " niang " and " niang " were strictly distinguished. The former means a girl and the latter. It means mother. After the Song Dynasty, the distinction gradually mixed. " Niang " also means mother. The habit of calling mother mother is still retained in most northern Chinese dialects in modern times.

The oracle is used as a person's name, such as "The Collection" 11423: "Broom (Wu) Niang".

Ancient books are used as the original meaning, such as "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Songs of the Qing Dynasty. "Song of the Midnight": "Seeing my mother happy and charming, I would like to get a golden orchid." Tang Xianzu's "The Story of the Purple Hairpin": "The Nong family's youth gets pity for the mother"; it is also used as an excuse, as in Wang Shifu's "The Story of the West Chamber": "The white-headed lady is not burdened, and the young girl is a burden."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The oracle bone inscriptions start with the sound of " female " and " good ", the original meaning is girl, and later it borrows the meaning of " niang " to mean mother.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「女」，「良」聲，本義為少女，後借「孃」之義，表示母親，參見「孃」。《唐韻》：「娘，同孃，少女之號。」段玉裁注「孃」云：「又按《廣韻》孃，女良切，母稱。娘亦女良切，少女之号。唐人此二字分用畫然，故耶孃字斷無有作娘者，今人乃罕知之矣。」「娘」、「孃」二字在唐代以前區分嚴格，前者表示少女，後者表示母親，宋代之後區別漸混，「娘」亦表示母親，稱呼母親為娘的習慣，現代仍保留於中國北方大部分方言中。

　　卜辭用作人名，如《合集》11423反：「帚（婦）娘」。

　　古書用作本義，如《樂府詩集．清商曲辭．子夜歌》：「見娘喜容媚，願得結金蘭」。湯顯祖《紫釵記》：「儂家少年得娘憐」；亦用作假借義，如王實甫《西廂記》：「白頭娘不負荷，青春女成擔擱」。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「女」，「良」聲，本義為少女，後借「孃」之義，表示母親。

English Definition: mother; young lady; (coll.) effeminate

Pictophonetic: 良 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.

    • 良 [ liáng ] good, virtuous, respectable

娘娘RS mother, young girl, woman, wife

  • ⿰ Left to right

②对年轻女子的称呼：娘子。姑娘。娇娘。新娘。
③称长一辈或年长的已婚妇女：大娘。婶娘。

娘(むすめ): daughter

甲骨文從「 女 」，「 良 」聲，本義為少女，後借「 孃 」之義，表示母親，參見「 孃 」。《唐韻》：「娘，同孃，少女之號。」段玉裁注「 孃 」云：「又按《廣韻》孃，女良切，母稱。娘亦女良切，少女之号。唐人此二字分用畫然，故耶孃字斷無有作娘者，今人乃罕知之矣。」「 娘 」、「 孃 」二字在唐代以前區分嚴格，前者表示少女，後者表示母親，宋代之後區別漸混，「 娘 」亦表示母親，稱呼母親為娘的習慣，現代仍保留於中國北方大部分方言中。 卜辭用作人名，如《合集》11423反：「帚（婦）娘」。 古書用作本義，如《樂府詩集．清商曲辭．子夜歌》：「見娘喜容媚，願得結金蘭」。湯顯祖《紫釵記》：「儂家少年得娘憐」；亦用作假借義，如王實甫《西廂記》：「白頭娘不負荷，青春女成擔擱」。
Elaboration: The oracle bone inscriptions start with the sound of " female" and " good", the original meaning is girl, and later borrow the meaning of " niang" to mean mother, see " niang" "Tang Yun": "Mother, Tongmian, the name of a young girl." Duan Yucai's note of " Mother" says: "According to the "Guang Yun" mother, the female is good, and the mother is called. The mother is also the good cut, the name of the girl The two characters in the Tang dynasty are divided into pictures. Therefore, there is no such thing as a mother in the word Yeniang, which is rarely known today." Before the Tang Dynasty, the two characters " niang" and " niang" were strictly distinguished. The former means a girl and the latter. It means mother. After the Song Dynasty, the distinction gradually mixed. " Niang" also means mother. The habit of calling mother mother is still retained in most northern Chinese dialects in modern times. The oracle is used as a person's name, such as "The Collection" 11423: "Broom (Wu) Niang". Ancient books are used as the original meaning, such as "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Songs of the Qing Dynasty. "Song of the Midnight": "Seeing my mother happy and charming, I would like to get a golden orchid." Tang Xianzu's "The Story of the Purple Hairpin": "The Nong family's youth gets pity for the mother"; it is also used as an excuse, as in Wang Shifu's "The Story of the West Chamber": "The white-headed lady is not burdened, and the young girl is a burden."

娘字的基本解释

娘
niáng
母亲：娘亲。娘家。爹娘。
对年轻女子的称呼：娘子。姑娘。娇娘。新娘。
称长一辈或年长的已婚妇女：大娘。婶娘。

娘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niáng］
［《廣韻》女良切，平陽，娘。］
(1)年轻女子。
(2)为妇女的通称。
(3)母亲。本作“孃”。
(4)奴婢对女主人也称娘。
(5)称人之妻。
(6)用以称宫妃。
(7)称长一辈或年长的妇人。
(8)詈词。犹“他妈的”。

娘字的英文翻译

◎ 娘
a woman, mother, mum

娘字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　娘； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页262第16
【唐韻】女良切【集韻】【韻會】尼良切。?同孃。少女之號。【唐書·平陽公主傳】高祖女，柴紹妻。高祖起兵，主與紹得數百人以應帝，定京師，號娘子軍。　又馬頭娘，蜀女，化爲蠶。見【圖經】。　又雪衣娘，鸚鵡名，見【開元遺事】。　又雪面娘，馬名。【李肇國史補】八百哥，雪面娘，窣地嬌，銜蟬奴，皆魏王繼笈馬名。　又紅姑娘，野果名，見【徐一夔·元故宮記】。　又嫵媚娘，唐樂府曲名。　又通作孃。後世稱母后曰孃孃。【蘇軾·龍川雜志】仁宗謂劉氏爲大孃孃，楊氏爲小孃孃。　又俗稱父曰爺，母曰娘。亦作耶孃。【古樂府】不聞耶孃喚女聲，但聞黃河流水鳴濺濺。【杜甫·兵車行】耶孃妻子走相送，塵埃不見咸陽橋。

娘字的源字形

娘字的起名意思

母亲。也称长一辈的或年长的已婚妇女为娘。

mother
Basic explanation of words
mother
niáng
Mother: Mother. Natal. Father and mother.
The address for young women: Niangzi. girl. Jiaojiao. bride.
Called the elder or older married woman: aunt. Auntie.
mother
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niáng］
["Guangyun" female Liangqie, Pingyang, mother. ]
(1) Young women.
(2) Generic term for women.
(3) Mother. This is a "mother".
(4) The slave and maidservant are also called mothers to the mistress.
(5) Called the wife of a man.
(6) Used to call the imperial concubine.
(7) Called the elder generation or elder woman.
(8) Abuse words. Still "fuck".
mother
English translation of words
◎ mother
a woman, mother, mum
mother
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　 Niang; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 262 16
[Tang Yun] Female Liang Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Ni Liang cut. ? Tong mother. The Maid's Number. [Tang Shu·Princess Pingyang Biography] Grandpa daughter, Chai Shao's wife. The great ancestors raised their troops, and hundreds of people from the Lord and Shaode Yingdi, set the capital, and called the Women's Army.　Ma Tau Niang, Shu Girl, turned into silkworm. See 【Picture Classic】.　You Xueyiniang, the name of the parrot, see [Kaiyuan's legacy].　You Xuemianniang, the name of the horse. [Supplement to the History of Li Zhaoguo] Eight hundred brothers, Xuemianniang, Jiao Dijiao, and cicada slaves, are all named Wei Wangjijima.　You Hong girl, the name of wild fruit, see [Xu Yokui·The Yuan Palace].　You Meimei Niang, the name of the Tang Yuefu song.　It's a mother again. Later generations are called mother queen and empress. [Su Shi·Longchuan Magazine] Renzong said that Liu was the aunt and Yang was the little.　It is also commonly known as the father is the father, and the mother is the mother. Also known as Ye Niang. [Guyuefu] I don’t hear the voice of Ye Niang calling girls, but I hear the water splashing and splashing in the Yellow River. [Du Fu·Chariot Shop] Yeniang’s wife walked to see each other, but Xianyang Bridge was not seen in the dust.
mother
Source glyph
mother
Name meaning
mother. The older or older married women are also called mothers.
娘
会意字。从女、从良(美好),良(lidng )兼表声,表示年轻女子美好。本义是年轻女子。引申指母亲。
D年轻女子:姑~「新~。2母亲:~家|爹~|亲~。③
称长--辈的或年长已婚的妇女:大~ 1姉~。

Зная слово.
Цун Ну, Цун Лян (хорошо) и Лиднг (Лиднг) выражают голоса, указывая на то, что молодые женщины хороши.
Первоначальное значение - молодая женщина.
В более широком смысле это относится к матери.
D Молодая женщина: тетя ~ "новенькая ~. 2 мать: ~ дом | папа ~ | дорогая ~. Женщины, которых называют старшими или старшими замужними женщинами: старшая ~ 1 сестра ~".

niáng
I сущ.
1) девушка; девочка, барышня; молодая женщина
少娘 молодая женщина (дама)
鱼鱼娘 девочка-рыбачка
2) мать, матушка; женщина; родительница
爷娘 отец и мать
3) госпожа; барыня

子孙娘 покровительница потомства
II межд.
ой мама! (восклицание удивления, также бран.)
III прил.
разг. женоподобный

娘

Значения

Девушка, дочь

Мнемоника

  • Хороший 良 ребёнок женского пола 女 — дочь.

  • "Моя дочь — хорошая 良 девушка 女."

Варианты

孃, 嬢

Radicals: 女, 良  (woman, good)
Meaning Mnemonic
A woman who is good is my daughter. My daughter is a good woman, I guarantee it.
Look at how good this woman is! She’s my daughter! She’s good! You wish your daughter was as good a woman as mine is!
Reading Mnemonic
Your daughter, on the other hand, is not a good woman. Your daughter looks like a moose who may (むすめ) not be able to find its way out of a wet paper bag. Your daughter looks like a moose who may lose its way without a map. Your daughter looks like a moose who may do lots of stupid things.
Think about how your daughter is basically a moose who may do dumb things. How ashamed you feel. How very, very ashamed. Unlike how I feel about my wonderful, perfect, not a moose-like daughter.

女 (женщина), 艮 (северо-восток)
